Hello SyntaxHighlighter

	Profile=Default
 Process=Default

    # Prepare message
    mkdir "${ProjectDir}/QA/in/"
    cp "${MsgBaseDir}/test.txt" "${ProjectDir}/QA/in/"
    chmod a-rw "${ProjectDir}/QA/in/test.txt"

    # Run project
    startFlow -test-name=$TestName -project=$Project -flow="${Flow}#1" -log=$ProjectDir -wait-for-eot=10

    # Check result
    local result=$(cat "${FlowLog}" | grep Error)

    if [[ $result == *"has a data consistency error"* ]]
       then
          LogError "${TestName}: General error message created: ${result}"
          return
    fi
    LogSuccess "${TestName}"
    return 0
